group_1.textLeft: Is someone here again?

group_1.textCenter: I'm scared, I'm scared, I'm scared...

group_1.textRight: If you want to be eaten so badly,@I'll devour you...!

group_1.textCenter: Okay, just ignore all the copies except@those that are attacking you!
I'll clear the way. You three follow me!

group_1.textLeft: Sae, don't worry about the copies.@Just look for your sister.

group_1.textRight: O-okay...!

group_1.textLeft: You won't go any further!

group_1.textRight: I don't have time to play with you guys.
[flashEffect:flashWhite2]...Farewell.

group_1.textLeft: Eeeep...?!@I'm scared, I'm scared, I'm scared...!

group_1.textRight: Ngh...where am I...?!

group_1.textCenter: You'll just have to settle with wasting your time@being tormented by my illusions...

group_1.textRight: Amazing...

group_1.textLeft: Now, this way! Let's go further!

group_1.textRight: Sayumiiii...?!

group_1.textLeft: No response around here either...

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: She's pretty hard to find, huh...
Maybe she's a little further in!

group_1.textRight: Sayumi...she must be alone and frightened...
Yet I'm supposed to be her older sister...@I wanted to help her as soon as I could, but...

group_1.textLeft: ...Let's take a break. There aren't many copies@in this area.

group_1.textRight: Don't worry about me! I'm fine!

group_1.textLeft: But Sae, this is your first time exploring Mirrors,@right?
If you're in an unfamiliar place, your physical and@magical energy are gonna get exhausted quickly.
Let's take a little break, refresh ourselves, and@then get back to looking for your sister.
That's right, Sae! Don't sweat!

group_1.textRight: Shouldn't you say, "don't fret"?@It would be an issue if I couldn't sweat.

group_1.textLeft: Mgh...

group_1.textRight: ...But, you're right...@I was being impatient again.
I'll listen to you.
...It's just as Maria told me.
Your group is very good at persuasion...

group_1.textLeft: I see. Maria recommended us to you, right?

group_1.textRight: Yes.

group_1.textLeft: Couldn't you have asked Maria for help today?

group_1.textRight: She's supposed to be working today.@I wouldn't feel right contacting her.
The other Union girls seemed to be busy, too...

group_1.textLeft: It's okay to be selfish when your sister@is in trouble.

group_1.textRight: Yes... I'm sure you're correct.
But I don't really like to tell others about@my family, so...

group_1.textLeft: Well...everyone has things they@don't want to talk about, right?

group_1.textRight: Ah...yes...
...Thank you.
...Hey, may I ask you something, too?

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: ...Why did you three start working as bodyguards?
Ah, but you don't have to tell me if you@don't want to, though...!

group_1.textLeft: As Magical Girls, we aim to maintain a@neutral position.

group_1.textRight: Oh, so you're trying to network with other@Magical Girls...or something like that?

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha, well, maybe in a sort of way.
We figured if we stayed neutral, we wouldn't@get caught up in any conflicts.

group_1.textRight: I see... You have a purpose, huh?
It's wonderful to be able to work so hard@towards a goal...

group_1.textLeft: Are you workin' hard for somethin', too?

group_1.textRight: Well...just a little bit.
It would be nice if both of our efforts paid off.

group_1.textLeft: Right?
...Okay, well, let's resume our search now.

group_1.textRight: Yes...!
